description: Join us for a charcuterie workshop headed by our very own Haley White! Registration is required and the deadline is May 5th. All supplies and food is provided to create your very own 2 person charcuterie plate. Food may differ from those pictured.

Join us at Craft Local for an instructed charcuterie board class with Better Together Charcuterie. Learn how to perfectly pair meats & cheeses together while enjoying local Montana made brews and wines. We will wrap up the evening enjoying our boards with LIVE music from Jessica Allestad!

Indulge in the art of charcuterie with The Flat Top's upcoming workshop, led by our very own Haley White! Join us for a hands-on experience creating your very own 2-person charcuterie plate. All supplies and food will be provided.
